comment:
По достижении 50% ХП у Медного Шепота стартует 
особая кат-сцена, в которой Шепот поулчает фулхп, 
Эсхатос выходит из-под контроля

languages.text: "Ваше поражение предрешено! Иной исход не допустим!"

traits.locale_text: "Ваше поражение предрешено! Иной исход не допустим!"

languages.text: "Your defeat is predetermined! No other outcome is possible!"
languages.original_text: "Ваше поражение предрешено! Иной исход не допустим!"

traits.locale_text: "Your defeat is predetermined! No other outcome is possible!"
"Your defeat is predetermined! No other outcome is possible!"
"Your defeat is predetermined! No other outcome is possible!"
"Your defeat is predetermined! No other outcome is possible!"
"Your defeat is predetermined! No other outcome is possible!"

languages.text: “你们注定会失败！不可能有其他结果！”
languages.original_text: "Your defeat is predetermined! No other outcome is possible!"

traits.locale_text: “你们注定会失败！不可能有其他结果！”

languages.text: "Eure Niederlage ist vorherbestimmt! Es ist kein anderer Ausgang möglich!"
languages.original_text: "Your defeat is predetermined! No other outcome is possible!"

traits.locale_text: "Eure Niederlage ist vorherbestimmt! Es ist kein anderer Ausgang möglich!"

languages.text: « Votre défaite est écrite ! C'est inévitable ! »
languages.original_text: "Your defeat is predetermined! No other outcome is possible!"

traits.locale_text: « Votre défaite est écrite ! C'est inévitable ! »

languages.text: «¡Vuestra derrota está predeterminada! ¡No hay otro resultado posible!».
languages.original_text: "Your defeat is predetermined! No other outcome is possible!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Vuestra derrota está predeterminada! ¡No hay otro resultado posible!».

languages.text: 「お前の負けは決まったも同然だ！それ以外の結果はあり得ない！」
languages.original_text: "Your defeat is predetermined! No other outcome is possible!"

traits.locale_text: 「お前の負けは決まったも同然だ！それ以外の結果はあり得ない！」

languages.text: "Mağlubiyetiniz baştan belli! Başka bir sonuç mümkün değil!"
languages.original_text: "Your defeat is predetermined! No other outcome is possible!"

traits.locale_text: "Mağlubiyetiniz önceden belli! Başka bir çıktı mümkün değil!"
